argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-2o | |- 2o = suc 1o |
| 2 | 1 | #P_oveq2i | |- ( A .o 2o ) = ( A .o suc 1o ) |
| 3 |  | #P_1onn | |- 1o e. _om |
| 4 |  | #P_nnmsuc | |- ( ( A e. _om /\ 1o e. _om ) -> ( A .o suc 1o ) = ( ( A .o 1o ) +o A ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( A e. _om -> ( A .o suc 1o ) = ( ( A .o 1o ) +o A ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_nnm1 | |- ( A e. _om -> ( A .o 1o ) = A ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( A e. _om -> ( ( A .o 1o ) +o A ) = ( A +o A ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( A e. _om -> ( A .o suc 1o ) = ( A +o A ) ) |
| 9 | 2, 8 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( A e. _om -> ( A .o 2o ) = ( A +o A ) ) |
